jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan library documentation Documentation

1.0

Introduction

This package implements the abstract interface robotDynamics. The algorithm considers a tree of bodies and compute forward dynamics for a given configuration, and a given velocity. The computation includes also linear and angular momentum, as well as their derivatives, and finally the ZMP. A specific object is the HumanoidDynamicMultiBody which specifies a humanoid organization of the bodies: wait, arms, legs, head , etc... All the algorithms are described in the book of Shuji Kajita "Humanoid Robot".
